attributes.action: Capt Tom Moore has shown how beloved our NHS Is.   Pass laws to fully fund it.
attributes.additional_details: The covid-19 pandemic has shown us all how fundamentally necessary the NHS is.  Fundraising shows how the voters value it.
attributes.background: Remove the NHS from profiteering companies by removing the tendering requirement.  Fund it above all other national requirements.  Capt Tom Moore has shown how beloved it is to the electorate.
